body_text:
I got excited.
Plus, it would be good to have this in place before we get serious about deploying, so that we don't have to figure it out with our hit points later.
One problem here is that pip will use wheels where it can. That will result in different hashes on different systems for some packages (those with platform specific wheels). I think we are going to have to find these by trial and error (at least, until @peterbe finishes Peepin 2: Hashin Boogaloo).
